• Make a dental appointment. 
HSC dental care is free during 
pregnancy and for a year 
after the birth of your baby.
• Just 12 weeks after 
conception, your baby is fully 
formed. It has all its organs, 
muscles, limbs and bones, 
and its sex organs are well 
developed. However, it takes 
several more 
weeks to 
easily identify 
the	difference	
between 
boys and girls 
on ultrasound 
scan.
